queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.securityContext.privileged is unset or false

queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/dev/nvidiactl' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/dev/nvidiactl' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/usr/lib64/libnvidia-ml.so.1' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/usr/lib64/libnvidia-ml.so.1' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/usr/lib64/libnvidia-ml.so' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/usr/lib64/libnvidia-ml.so' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/usr/bin/nvidia-smi' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/usr/bin/nvidia-smi' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/dev/nvidia0' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/dev/nvidia0' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.volumeMounts.name={{nvidia-smi}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.volumeMounts.name={{nvidiactl}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.volumeMounts.name={{libnvidia-ml-so-1}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.volumeMounts.name={{nvidia0}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.volumeMounts.name={{libnvidia-ml-so}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/usr/bin/nvidia-smi' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/usr/bin/nvidia-smi' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nvidia-gpu-exporter}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.readinessProbe should be defined

metadata.name={{release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Name Undefined Or Empty
queries.description: A Kubernetes Pod should have a Service Account defined so to restrict Kubernetes API access, which means the attribute 'serviceAccountName' should be defined and not empty.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-nvidia-gpu-exporter-test-connection.spec.serviceAccountName should be defined

spec.containers.name=wget should have resources defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
